content.query:
-- CRIA FORMATO PARQUET 
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats 
WHERE name = 'ParquetFormat') 
    CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [ParquetFormat] 
    WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET) 
GO 

--CRIA FORMATO CSV SKIP CABECALHO 
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'skipHeader_CSV') 
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT skipHeader_CSV 
    WITH (FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT, 
          FORMAT_OPTIONS( 
                FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',', 
                STRING_DELIMITER = '"', 
                FIRST_ROW = 2, 
                USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = True) 
    )
